articles.title: Princess Diana heartbreak: Royal knew Prince Charles and Camilla were ‘true love match’ - Express
articles.description: PRINCESS DIANA is said to have known how in love her then-husband Prince Charles and Camilla, Duchess of Cornwall, were, leading her to 'get her story out there' in the iconic BBC Panorama interview.
